channel.title: AWS on Marco's Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content in AWS on Marco's Tech Blog

item.title: The Cloud Resume Challenge, Part 1 - Introduction
item.description: Introduction I recently completed The Cloud Resume Challenge and found it very interesting. I bought my first ever domain, and explored some basic AWS services. This project definitely gets me started on AWS and how powerful it is, so I encourage you to try too. In the next few blogs, I am going to write up how I completed this prject and what I have learned. Why This Challenge I have always been very keen in Cloud related technology ever since I first heard the term from university course.
